                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Kunburrkken karolbme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The functioning of the body.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Kunbalakkurlkurlme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A generic term for smaller skinks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Synonymsburndjingh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameCarlia amax, Cryptoblepharus plagiocephalus, Ctenotus inornatus, Sphenomorphus douglasi, Morethia storri

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Sleep lightly, half asleep.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ngadjalkaklorrhmiyoy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  I only slept lightly last night, I didn't sleep well.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Hollow.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yirrbardbard kukborledkerrinj nayin yimerranj wanjh ngimeng kore manwodj mandulklorrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Yirrbardbard turned himself into a snake, and went into a hollow log.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Dulklorrkkelorrkken nakka yiman nayuhyungkih kabirriyo kore kundulk manlohlorrk kore kurrangmaye kundulk kore Ankung Djang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dulklorrkkelorrkken spirits are like creation Ancestors, they live in hollow trees, where the trees have an opening, in Honey Dreaming country.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku,Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1Bone pole coffin.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  2Bone pole mortuary ceremony.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Peel off bark or a strip of wood from a tree, especially Eucalyptus tetrodonta.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Birridulklowkmangi mandubang kundulk birridjedmi bokko manmirrh birrimarnbuni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      They would strip the bark from the ironwood and carve the wood into spear tips.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Spear type, shovel-nosed spear with a hardwood tip.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Mankole ngarriyime manwern korroko bu dabborrabbolk birrimarnbuni manbu kayime bokko madjawarr ngarrkidjba lulumarra.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      There are lots of different types of spears that people used to make in the past, for example bokko, madjawarr, ngarrkidjba and lulumarra.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Dabborrabbolk korroko birrimarnbuni lulumarra, yiman kayime barrawu birrimarnbuni bu mayhken birriyami. Kundulk bebbehbeh birrimangi birrimarnbuni lulumarra, wanjh yerre mankole manbu kundulk birribakkeyi wanjh birridjarlkkennami. Wanjh yerre ngolin birribelebelbmi, wanjh birrimarnbuni rayekmeni wanjh birriyami mayh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In the old days our ancestors used to make shovel-nosed wooden hunting spears called lulumarra, similar to barrawu spears. They would make the spear tip from special types of tree, then break off part of another tree for the shaft, and attach it. They would stick beeswax on (to hold it together), the wax would harden and they would hunt with it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mythological being associated with mardayin ceremony.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Swell up.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1'time to act', 'let it happen'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Wardi ngurrina, kaborrkke, ma, ma!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hey you all have a look, he's going to dance, here he goes, here he goes!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2OK, alright, a confirmation of or agreement with a proposition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • A: La ngunemre? B: Yo wolewoleh nganemre. A: Ma!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A: Are you two coming? B: Yes, we'll come in the afternoon. A: OK then.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Wait.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Name of a duwa moiety patriclan on the upper East Alligator River region.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Manih yinan kabore Ngalngordbudjum. Mankabo kawanjdjadduluburren, Kukalangak, kaddum kure na-Maddalk kunred. Kaddum manwanjdjad Maddalk Karlbakarridjam, Kalawan Kamik, Worrkorl kilhken.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            You see this [creek] it goes to Ngalngordbudjum. The confluence of this creek [with the river] is at Kukalangak and upstream from there it is Maddalk clan country. Following that creek upstream are the Maddalk clan sites of Karlbakarridjam, Kalawan Kamik, and the Worrkorl clan land is downstream.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Bardayal Nadjamerrek)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1Not want to give something up, hang onto something, not want to leave something.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Nawu Nakodjok kukmaddengi nawu duruk. Minj djareniwirrinj benwoyi nawu duruk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Nakodjok was hanging onto that dog, he didn't want to give it away.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Wurdyaw maddi phone ngalengarre daluk. Wanjh ngalbadjan kayime "Med ngakerlkkerlkbun ngadjawan wanjh nganwon dja won."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The child was hanging onto the woman's phone, he didn't want to give it back. So his mother said "Wait, I'll talk it off him, he'll give it to me and then I'll give it back to you".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bonj, kanmaddeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            That’s enough, you are delaying me from leaving.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2 Accompany.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Nawu wurdyaw kahdjare kabihmaddeng nakornkumo.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The boy wants to go with his father.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ngalwakadj bimarneyimeng Ngalkangila "Ngaye maddeng bu ngarrdjarrkre balbbara".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Nalwakadj said to Ngalkangila "I'll go with you, we can accompany each other".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          See alsobolkmaddeng

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Black-headed python.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Scientific nameAspidites melanocephalus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKunwinjku, Kuninjku, Kundedjnjenghmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Kunbalakngaldjangarakurlngunj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Octopus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Gilbert's dragon (named after Ludwig Leichhardt's exploration companion John Gilbert), also known as the 'tata lizard' or 'bobo lizard', so named because of the lizard's habit of waving its hand. Note that increasingly, younger people are using the name madjarndemed in a more general sense to also refer to Diporiphora species (various lined-dragons).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameLophognathus gilberti, Diporiphora spp.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Morruyhmorruyh ngudjbang kalobme, madjarndemed ngudjwarre kare.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The ring-tailed dragon runs swiftly but Gilbert's dragon is much slower when it moves.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Madjarndemed barra ngalero, madjandemed barra ngalero, madjarndemed barra ngalero, kabidbun kuwardde kawohbarndi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                [Lyrics to the Bongolinj-bongolinj song ‘Madjarndemed’.] ‘Barra ngalero’ has no meaning in ordinary language as it is said to be the language of the madjarndemed lizard. The last phrase means ‘it climbs up and sits halfway up the rock’.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (http://bininjkunwok.org.au/bongolinj-bongolinj/)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1Kind of grass used for making spear shafts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific namePhragmites karka

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Spear made from cane-grass used for hunting fish or geese.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Madjawarr yidadjdjemen yimarnbu mankole.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cut that cane grass and make a spear.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3Name of a clan whose land is in the area of Nimbuwa rock.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Name of a duwa moiety patriclan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Anbolh ngarribunjyidurndengi, arridadjkeyi arrikolemirndemey, Marranboy. Ngarridjohdjorrngmi Djulnuk o maitbi ngamed, barridjorrngmi, ankole arridjorrngmi Wurlbbum. Ngale mak ngakordidjmerren kumekke, ngalekke mak berlbarli ngadburrung Madjba kumekke kangeyyo [laughter]. Ya, ngabolkdarrame ke.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We'd follow the route back, carrying the bundles of bamboo spear shafts having cut large numbers of them coming from Marranboy. We'd straighten out the shafts at Djulnuk or maybe whatsit, we'd straighten them out at Wurlbbum. I've just sworn at myself because my sister of the Madjba clan has the same name as that place [laughs]. Yes, I'm referring to her for you by saying the name of that

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cool breeze that comes from the ocean and blows inland, typically in the afternoon in the late dry season.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bu mahbilil kabun wanjh ngarrinan kaworlhworlhme manbu kunmayorrk mankimuk wanjh kunu ngarriburrbun bu kurrula kabidbun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    When there's an sea breeze, we see strong gusts of wind and we know that the tide is rising.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKunwinjku,Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Agree to go somewhere, give assent to a travel proposal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku, Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Good.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • ngalkebmak

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      attractive woman

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • manmanjmak

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      good tasting food

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ngurrimak? Yo, ngarrimak.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Is everyone OK? Yes, we're fine.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Kamak?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Is everything OK?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Namak nakkan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      He's a good man.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalakkamarlang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    1Also, too, as well, and also.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ngarwunja rolk djang mak ngurrurdu djang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      There are maggot and also emu sacred sites at Ngarwunja.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "Kandadju kundad dja ngamarrwedoweng." "Aba, minj won, ngaye mak ngamarrwedoweng."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "Give me a [turtle] leg, because I'm hungry” “No way. I can't give you any. I'm hungry too."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Manakgu, Andrew, ‘Bu Ngurriborlhme Kunwinjku: Learning Kunwinjku’, Kunwinjku Language Centre, Gunbalanya, 1994)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2Alternatively, or alternatively, or also. Often preceded by yika.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bu korroko nawu dabborrabbolk birrimarnbuni kuluyambi bu kudjewk yimerrangeni. Wanjh birrikarrikmi, yika mak birribolkdjudmi mandulkkuyeng bu birrirey.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In the old days our ancestors used to make rafts in the wet season. Then they would row them, or alternatively use a long stick to push off from the river bed and pole the raft.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    3 Either (in negative phrases, i.e. 'not either').

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Malalam ngarriyime yiman kayime kabbal mankabbalwarlah dja mankimuk. Minj kundulk kadi dja kunrorre dja kunkayalanj kadjalyo. Mak minj kukku kaboyo yiman kabolkdarlehmen ngarrinan kundjulng kadolkarren mak kamirrhmirrhme. Dja mak karrinan yiman kukku kaboyo kore kabbal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      What we call a desert is like a large, wide floodplain without trees, only dirt and sand. There's no water either, it's a dry place where the dust rises in clouds and the heat shimmers in the air. It can also look as if there is water there, like a floodplain [a mirage].

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    -minj mak

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Not either, not any more, not any further, not after that, not again.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Northern mud cod, also known as spangled gudgeon.
