                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        That black rock kangaroo eats Melodorum fruit, sometimes it comes down from the rocks and eats other kinds of food.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKuninjku, Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Stem of a plant, e.g. the edible stems of waterlilies.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Grammarincorporable noun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kind of small to medium sized tree (4-12m).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scientific nameOwenia vernicosa, Owenia reticulata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Manbu manbarlarra kundulk wanjh ngarridjeddjedmi ngarrimangi mankange bu ngarridongi dja ngarridjuhkeyi kore kukku wanjh nawu djenj dowerreni bu wanjh birrikukdarlkani wanjh ngarrikukmangi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          We used to chip the bark off the of the Owenia vernicosa tree, get the inner bark [by scraping it off the wood], pound that up and put the in the water. Then the fish would die and float to the surface, and we could collect them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1Vagina.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2Entrance hole to Tetragonula hockingsi bee hive.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Fruit of a plant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Yukkuyukku nawu mayh kukyahwurd nganbengdayhke ngadberre bu manme kakinje wanjh karung ba bu ngarrire ngarrimang manu manme yiman kayime manyuku, mandjurrukumarlba, kunkurlurrk dja mak manwern manbu manbarnem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The firefly is a small insect, (the appearance of) which lets us know that fruit is ripening, so that we can go and gather it, for example manyuku berries (Antidesma parvifolium), mandjurrukkumarlba (Antidesma ghaesembilla) and kunkurlurrk (Memecylon pauciflorum) and all kinds of other fruits.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Wanjh ngalbu daluk dulknang, nang mandulkmakkaykenh dja nang manbarnemmak.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              She saw that the tree was beautiful and its fruit looked delicious. [Genesis 3:6, New Living Translation]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Genesis, Exodus 1-14 and 20, Ruth, Luke, John, Acts and Ephesians in Kunwinjku, Bible Society in Australia, 1992)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Grammarincorporable as barnem-

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            -barnemdi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Have fruit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            1Gorge or narrow rift in escarpment country.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Kubarrarndjokko.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In a narrow gorge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            2Steep or vertical cliff face, steep ridge line.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3Rut, washed out rut on the road.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4The entrance piece or mouth of a mandjabu 'woven conical fish trap'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Grammarincorporable as -barrarn- e.g. ngabarrarnnang 'I saw a gorge'; can take a third person singular verbal prefix and function as a

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -barrarnmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Enter a gorge, pass through a gorge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Quinine tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific namePetalostigma pubescens

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKuninjku, Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Spear grass.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameSorghum spp.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bu manbedje kahmerlem dja kanguybun, bu kamirrhburlerran dja kamirrhwarrawarrhme, wanjh kunukka manimunak kawirlarrkkurrme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      When the spear grass grows thick and flowers, then the sharp seeds turn black and fall to the ground, that’s when the magpie goose lays her eggs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalakkerabilidja

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Pandanus tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific namePandanus spiralis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Kundjikurdubuk manbelk karri.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      At Kundjikurdubuk there is pandanus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Penis.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Lumaluma kakarrme manberd mankimuk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Lumaluma has a large penis.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, ‘Kunwinjku Spirit’, Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    -manberdkurlah

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Foreskin.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Clapsticks for musical accompaniment, usually made of ironwood (mandubang).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Synonymsmanbirlmurrng

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bu mamurrng dja mulil birrimey birriwayini wanjh birrikani bedberre manberlnginj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      When there was an Mamurrng ceremony or a ceremonial feast, people would take their clapsticks along.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    1Open forest, savanna woodland, open plain country. Relatively flat, open and dry areas as opposed to rocky country, floodplains or areas of thicker vegetation around watercourses.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Modjdje kadjaldjordmen kore kabbal minj kadjordmen kore manberrk dja kore kuwardehwarde.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Spike rushes only grow on floodplains, they don't grow in dry forest areas or in rocky country.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Dedded karrinan ngalwern kore manberrk dja kore kungarre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We see lots of lorikeets in open forest areas and in thicker jungle areas.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2Outside, the open.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ngarrihnang manberrk bidbom kinga.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We saw that the crocodile had climbed up and out in the open (i.e. out of the water).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    3Dry country, desert.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Synonymskuberrk-kombuk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      See alsomanbeberrk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Splinter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kaluk kumekbe nawu wurduhwurdurd birrihni kaluk birrinahnani Wirrihwirrihyak nawu dengelurlmeng manbik bimarneni kore kurrenge nuye.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The children were there looking after Wirrihwirrihyak, whose foot was swollen because he had a splinter in his foot.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Nganjmirra, Jill & Tildemann, Sonia, ‘Old Woman Emu and other Kunwinjku stories’, Batchelor Press, Batchelor, N.T., 2005, p. 6)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -bikmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Pull out a splinter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Anbinik tree, large monsoon forest tree (15-30m) which grows only in the sandstone escarpment country of western Arnhem Land and

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Nangarridj boken benewam beneyerrkang kudjurle kore manbinik karrulkdi, mandulkkimuk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Two Nangarridj skin men went and sat down in the shade of a large Anbinik tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Peter Carroll AIATSIS collection)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      See alsomibinihbinik

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Species of Melaleuca which includes the water tree djidjerok. Water was obtained from one variety of this tree in times of drought by breaking open the side of the tree with an axe.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Synonymsmandjinh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameMelaleuca nervosa

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bu ngarrire manberrk ngarrinan manbu kundulk kadulkngeyyo manbirdubbirdu. Kawohdulkdjinh. Ngarridulklowkmang wanjh kukku kambobebme bu ngarribongun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        When we go walking in the bush, we see Melaleuca nervosa trees. Where we see a lump partway up the tree, we peel off the bark and water comes out that we can drink.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Generic term for all sea turtles. Bininj Kunwok speakers are inland people and do not have many terms for marine species.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bininj birrirey kubbunj kore kurrula birridulubuni ngalidjdjalidj manbiri dja marndingunjngunj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        People would go out on the sea in canoes and spear sea turtles and dugongs with harpoons.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku, Kuninjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Flame, tongue of flame.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bu ngarriwarlbun mayh yiman ngalmangiyi dja manimunak wanjh minj ngarribangmekinje nawu mayh bu manbirliwoldjenkimuk dja ngarrimadbun bu kunak kabirliwoldjenkolung dja kayirrkebakke, wanjh kunu ngarrikinje mayh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        When we hunt animals like long-necked turtles and magpie geese, we don't cook them while the flames of the fire are high, we wait until the flames die down and the wood is broken down into hot coals, and that's when we cook them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Wanjh bu bolkkime karrihnan nawu karrkkanj, nungka nadjawonjbeh dja mak kadjaldolkan bu kakerrkmang yiman bu yimihyimi kerrkmahkerrkmangi mankoleh. Kaluk bu kunak kabirriwurlhke, nungka kare kore kunak dja kamang nawu mayh wolbu kaluk manbu kunak wanjh makkah minj kabimang bu karung, dja kadjalwohdolkan kakerrkbawon manbu manbirliwoldjen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        These days when we see a brown falcon, we say he's of the Jawoyn tribe, and he still flies around as if he were dodging spears. When people burn off the bush, he flies above the fire front catching insects, but the fire won't catch him because he can just jump and dodge the flames.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Nganjmirra, Jill & Tildemann, Sonia, ‘Karrkanj Yimerranj’ in ‘Old Woman Emu and other Kunwinjku stories’, Batchelor Press, Batchelor, N.T, 2005, p. 90)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Kind of shrub (1.5-5m) with pointed narrow leaves growing in clusters along stems with flowers which provide nectar for honey bees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameVerticordia cunninghamii

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Manbirrbbirr kanguybun yekke bu kanguymarnbun mankungken. Dja mak ngarrinan wanjh nganbengdayhke ngadberre bu yekkeburrk kayimerran.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Manbirrbirr trees flower during yekke in order (for bees) to make honey, and when we see them we know that it's the middle of the cool season.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2In Kuninjku the name manbirrbbirr is used for a number of densely flowering shrubs and small trees including Verticordia cunninghamii, yellow flowering Austromyrtus species and also Acacia platycarpa which also has dense white

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameAustromyrtus spp.
