                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Rough leafed bloodwood; flowers may be white, pink or red, used for making didjeridus or mako.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Scientific nameCorymbia setosa

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Small to medium sized tree (3-10m) with edible black fruit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameSerisalisia sericia

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LanguageKunwinjku, Kuninjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Spear with three-uniserially barbed prongs fitted to a shaft so that each set of barbs is at right angles to the others.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A small, erect or straggly tree, 3-10 metres high,, also known as broad-leaved paperbark or broad-leaved tea-tree, grows along streams, in swampy areas and often in dense stands in open woodlands where the land may be seasonally flooded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Synonyms(m)an-darlbborrongko

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameMelaleuca viridiflora

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kundulk manbu kunkod kahkarrme ngarrinan kunmalaworr, wanjh ngarriburrbun, yiman kayime yilbinj, mandarl, mankorrko dja mandjinh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  When we see the leaves of paperbark trees, we can recognise them, for example whether a tree is yilbinj, mandarl fi:(Melaleuca_viridiflora), mankorrko fi:(Melaleuca_argentea) or mandjinh fi:(Melaleuca_nervosa).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKuninjku,Kune,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The roots of a plant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Warradjan kangun kunbak dja mandjimdjim mandedjmad.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The pig-nosed turtle eats water weeds and the roots of water pandanus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku,Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Waterlily, specifically the white-flowered waterlily and the edible corms of these waterlilies.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Synonymsburdbarrk (Kuninjku)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Nahni mayhmayh kangeyyo karrekuyengkuyeng karrinan kore manlabbarl manlabbarlkimuk kore mandem manwern kadi. Karrinan mandem kunworr kamelhmelme bu kare.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The bird called karrekuyengkuyeng (Jacana) can be found at large billabongs where there are lots of waterlilies. We see them walking over the lily-pads.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakmanmarrbalk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Truck, car, motor vehicle.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Synonymsmuddika

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Wurdwurd birriwam Kunkanginj wanjh birrikoluy kore mandengeyi wanjh birriwam birrihdirri kabbal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The children went to Kunkanginj, got out of the car and went to play on the floodplain.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Narndal, Julie and Namarnyilk, Lois, 'Kuhni bu birriwam ngalmangiyi', Gunbalanya)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Banded Grunter / Black-striped Grunter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameAmniataba percoides

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandiddi, Kubumi karri.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  There are Banded Grunter fish at Kubumi (on the Mann River).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Urine, piss.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKunwinjku,Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -dilebun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Urinate, piss.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cycad, cycad damper.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific nameCycas armstrongii

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Mandirnku kadulkdi kore kunred kubolkwern.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    There are cycad trees in many different clan lands.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Conical fish traps woven from Trophis scandens vine.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Dja korroko dabborrabbolk birrimarnbuni mandjabu wanjh birridjuhkeyi kore kukku manlabbarl yika kore mankabo wanjh djenj ngimi birrimangi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    And in the past, the old people would make fish traps, put them in the water in a billabong or river, the fish would go in and them they would get them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  1Straight.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2Proper, correct.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Mandjad ngarrbenbukkan wanjh mandjad kabirriyime kore school, bu kabirridurrkmirri, kabirribimbun, kabirribimnan, dja baleh yarrkka.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We show them the right way of doing things, so they will do the right thing at school, when they’re working, writing or reading, and all those things.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, ‘Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy’, PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • djendjad

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      One who speaks well, many languages or learns language easily.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    -dengedjad

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Good kicker (football).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Fire stick tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific namePremna acuminata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bu korroko dabborrabbolk birribakkeyi mandjakkorl kundulk manbu mandarle, manyende wanjh birrimarnbuni bokenh bu birriburdebmi, birriwurlhkeyi kunak.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In the old days, people used to break off dry branches from the fire stick tree, and rub one against the other in a drilling motion to make a fire.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalakkun-bembem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Darwin woollybutt tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameEucalyptus miniata (long-barked variety)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Red bush apple tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Synonymsdjarduk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameSyzygium suborbiculare

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mandjarduk karridulknan kadulkdi mandulkwern kore manberrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        We see a lot of red apple trees in open forest areas.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kunbalakdjangarakurdadj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Knife (made of metal as opposed to stone).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bininj yameng nganabbarru wanjh mey mandjawak kukyilkbom mey kundjen dja kunbirrkbirrkbokenh wanjh babburlibom kore kukarlang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A man shot a buffalo, then got a knife and cut off some meat, took the tongue and two ribs and carried it all off over his shoulder.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Nabobbob, Rose, ‘Kunbidkudji Kunwok’, Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, Gunbalanya)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      EtymologyThis is most likely a loan word but the origin of the loan is unknown.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kunbalakdjerrkudmiken.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Yellow kapok bush; a slender deciduous shrub or small tree to 7 m high; flowering and fruiting when the plant is leafless. The edible fleshy taproots are collected only from small plants, usually less than 30 cm tall. They are roasted in hot coals and the outer skin peeled. Kapok wool from the seed pods is used for body decoration in certain ceremonies. Young stems can be used as firestick drills. Bark used for paint brushes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameCochlospermum fraseri

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Buluk dorrengh anbu an-djedj, Lorrkkon Kunabibi karri-bulukmang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The kapok tree has down used for body decoration in the hollow log and Kunabibi ceremonies.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yika kundulk ngarrinan kanguybun wanjh ngarriyime kunj kabalem, bu manbu mandjedj kundulk kanguybun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Or sometimes flowers can tell us that the kangaroos are fat (and ready to hunt). That's the case with kapok flowers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku,Kuninjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Cold water, such as at the bottom of a deep stream

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2Any cold substance, eg. the air from an air conditioner.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mahni kunkanj mandjelmiken, yoy kore kunkedjelk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          That meat is cold, it's been in the fridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        See also-djelmirranj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1Rain.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mandjewk nganbom ngadberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The rain fell on us.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mandjewk kamankan nganbowon kukku.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The rain falls and gives me water.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Wildflower Band, ’Maburrinj (The lonely place called Maburrinj)’, from the Album ‘Manginburru Bininj’, Skinnyfish Music, 2009)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2Year (as measure of time).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Bu mandjewkbubuyika ngarre bininj kabirridowkke mako manmim lead kawernmerren kore kulabbahlabbarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          After a number of years, people firing shotguns constantly will lead to an accumulation of lead in the billabong.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kunbalakmandjil

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        GrammarTakes na- class agreement: mandjewk nakimuk 'big rain'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Water pandanus tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scientific namePandanus aquaticus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mandjimdjim kadjordmen kore kukku kaboyo kore mankabo manwanjdjad manlabbarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mandjimdjim (water pandanus) grows where there is water, by rivers, creeks and billabongs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)
