                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        LanguageKuninjku,Kune,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kunbalakkunyaril

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Lump, spike, bump.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Bu ngarrire manberrk ngarrinan manbu kundulk kadulkngeyyo manbirdubbirdu. Kawohdulkdjinh. Ngarridulklowkmang wanjh kukku kambobebme bu ngarribongun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          When we go walking in the bush, we see Melaleuca nervosa trees. Where we see a lump partway up the tree, we peel off the bark and water comes out that we can drink.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nawu kawolk nakka mayhmayh nawu mudburlerri dja kawohmudbele. Kakebdjinh kore kunkeb nuye.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The friarbird has both dark and light sections of plumage. It has a bump on its beak.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kind of common yellow-flowering acacia.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scientific nameAcacia difficilis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          -midjohdjodjo

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Grove of Acacia difficilis, wattle scrub.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          -djohbun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Strip acacia bark (usually to make string)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Smouldering or burning log after a bushfire has passed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bu kabirriwurlhke kunak karralkrung rowk wanjh mandjong bu karung darnkih kakebdowen wanjh kunmayorrk kaworlhme wanjh kamarnbun kayawoyhwurlhme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            When people start fires and all the grass burns, there are smouldering logs left behind, and when the wind blows them it makes them burst into flame again.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Name of possibly 4 different patriclans; a Kunwinjku duwa moiety Mandjulngunj in the region to the east and north-east of Kunbarlanja, another a Mengerr yirridjdja moiety Mandjulngunj on which the settlement of Kunbarlanja (Oenpelli) is situated, the third, a Mawng Mandjulngunj, yirridjdja moiety in the King River and Wellington Ranges district of western Arnhem Land and the fourth a now extinct Ngaduk language patriclan in north-east Kakadu National Park.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bu Kunbarlanja ngarre, Kunbarlanja ngarrbendjawan bininj ngadjawan and bininj nakohbanj minj nakohbanj bad yawurrinj, minj kakodjbulu kadjalbengkan. Ngarridjawan konda nangale nuye kunred, 'Mandjulngunj' kayime.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            If you and I go to Kunbarlanja and we ask people there, an old person and not just an older person, a young man also, someone who doesn't have grey hair, they would know [immediately]. If we ask 'Whose country is this [here at Kunbarlanja] he would say 'Mandjulngunj'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bonj wanjh konda bu konda Mandjulngunj kunred bonj manu mani ngarrbidbun nungka wanjh Maningkali manu mane manberrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            This is all Mandjulngunj country here, but if we go up [upstream in the catchment] it is Maningkali- all of this open forest savanna here.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1Small woody white-flowering Calytrix shrub.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Scientific nameCalytrix brownii

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            2Another kind of small sandstone habitat calytrix either easily confused with Calytrix brownii or together with it is collapsed into a super class.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameCalytrix achaeta

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Mandjumbak kunrakken.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Calytrix achaeta is good for fire wood.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKuninjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Kind of gardenia tree, used as a culinary herb for flavoring meat when cooking esp. in a ground oven (kunkerri).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameGardenia fucata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Manbu mandjungkurrk makka kundulk, dja kunmalaworr ngarrimang bu ngarrikerribun mayh yiman kunkanj nganabbarru, bulikki, kunj dja kurdukadji. Kamanjmakwon bu ngarringun kamak rowk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Mandjungkurrk is a kind of tree, and we gather its leaves when we cook animals in a ground oven, for example buffalo, bull, kangaroo or emu meat. It flavors the meat so it tastes good when we eat it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Jill Nganjmirra. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Andjungkurrk arridarme kamanjmakmen kunkanj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              We use andjungkurrk leaves to flavour meat and make it taste good. [Kundedjnjenghmi]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKundedjnjenghmi, Kuninjku, Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Olive Python.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameLiasis olivaceus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Kunbalakngalwirnyi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Yellow dye tree, Coelospermum reticulatus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameCoelospermum reticulatus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Purple currant tree, kind of shrub or small tree (usually 2-3 m) which has edible dark purple berries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameAntidesma ghaesembilla

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Bu kudjewk karrire wanjh karrihmang manu mandjurrukkumarlba.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In the wet season we go and collect Antidesma ghaesembilla berries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Narndal, Julie et. al. ‘Manme: Stories about food - Kunwinjku’, Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, 1982)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Bush cucumber vine with an edible fruit available in the wet season; annual climbing or trailing herb with simple tendrils.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameCurcumis melo

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Wanjh benebalwam benebolknang yimankek bu kungarre benebalngimeng, benenang mandolhdolh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  So they went and had a look around and were about to go into the jungle thicket. They saw some bush cucumbers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Mangiru, Hannah, 'Djakku dja Nabulanj Benewam', Oenpelli Literary Project, Gunbalanya 1976)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Ironwood.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameErythrophleum chlorostachys

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Dja bu birridoweni wanjh birrimangi kunworr mandubang birrirurrkwolngwoni kundolng dorrengh manbu kunrurrk kore yongohyoy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  And when someone died, then people would get leaves from the ironwood tree and smoke the place that person used to live in.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Green plum tree (taller variety, shorter variety is called fv:(m)an-wodberr).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Synonymsmanwodberr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameBuchanania obovata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Korroko bu ngarriyawani mandudjmi ngarrimangi ngarridahkendongi kundjabarrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In the old days when we used to look for green plums, we would put them in a dilly bag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Peter Carroll AIATSIS collection)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakmankordildil

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1Song.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Manbu karrbarda mandule dja kunborrk bu korroko nakudji nakohbanj dabbolk Nakangila Nabarrbinj marnbom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  An old Nakangila skin man of the Barrbinj clan made the Long Yam song and dance, a long time ago.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Accent in speech.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Bedda mandulebuyika kabirriwokdi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Those people have a different accent in the way they talk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                -dulebukkan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Teach someone a song, reveal a song to someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A kind of Acacia tree with silky blue-green leaves, sometimes called fish poison wattle or soapy wattle. Used to make spear shafts and sometimes the leaves used as an ichthycide.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameAcacia holosericia

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandulk yiman kadulkyime mandjoh dja ngalengman manmalaworrkimuk, kadjordmen kore kukabo dja kore njilhmi. Manekke birribakkeyi dabborrabbolk bu birridjarlkkennami lulumarra.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mandulk is a tree similar to mandjoh (Acacia difficilis), but with larger leaves. It grows by rivers and creeks. That's the tree that our ancestors used to break off to (make spear shafts to) attach to lulumarra type spear heads.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKune,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1Hill, mountain, elevated landform.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Benewam kore mandulum kabolkngeyyo Mankarrinjdji darnkih Warruwi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  They went to a hill called Mankarrinjdji near Warruwi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Mound, heap.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kunred ngalengarre karedmarnbun kunworr, manyahyay kundulk dja kunkurlk wanjh kamornname kadulummarnbun mandulumkimuk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  She (the jungle fowl) makes her nest from leaves, acacia branches and earth, gathering them to make a big mound.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                -manduluhdulum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Hills, hilly terrain, elevated area.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                That previously referred to, that known topic of discourse (agrees with vegetable class nouns).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Name of a yirridjdja moiety patriclan in the mouth of the Liverpool River associated with the Kunibídji and Kundjirrbara (the latter now extinct) languages. Manengkarerrbe clan members today speak the Ndjébbana language.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Get, obtain, collect.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kunbalak-modme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      --yimang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Take something off someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Name (or ethnonym) that includes all people with country in the Gumardir (Goomadeer) River Catchment — from rocky headwaters to coastal mudflats. This includes Kunwinjku and Mawng language clans.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Korroko Manginburru bininj birrini kunred ngardduk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A long time ago Manginburru people lived on my land.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Macassan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Saltwater, ocean, sea.
