                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  I'll go and get a stone axe for getting bush honey.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Manakgu, Andrew, ‘Kunbalak : stories for Kunwinjku young people in Mother-in-law language, ordinary Kunwinjku and English’, Kunwinjku Language Centre, Gunbalanya, 1996, pp. 12-15)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kunbalak ngarridakkodjwarlhke manwuybbin, nawu namanjmarlang bu ngarriyakwan dja ngarridjurlkkinmarlangweybun bu ngarridjurlkkinyakwan. Mak nawirihwiribbu manwuybbin nawu namarlang ngarriyakwan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Kunwinjku ngarringeybun mankung, nawu namanjmakkayken bu ngarringun dja ngarribomarnbun bu ngarribongun. Mak nabubuyika mankung nawu namanjmak.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In Kunbalak we say "manwuybbin" (and in Kunwinjku we say 'mankung') [bush honey]. It's good to eat and make into drinks. There are lots of different bush honey types that are very tasty.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Regular Bininj Kunwokmankung

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Generic term for the dead branches of various small woody shrubs and trees, especially acacias, which are used as kindling.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Bu karrire baleh kore manberrk karriwarlbun karrirednan djuwe karedmarnbun kamang kundalk dja manyahyay kundulk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If we go anywhere in the forest hunting we see bowerbird nests, it makes its nest by gathering grasses and acacia branches.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku,Kune

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1Branch coming off main stem or trunk of a tree or plant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Berrerdberrerd karrinan kabarndi kore kundulk manyende yika karrolkan kare kubuyika mayh kayawan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  We see Rainbow Bee Eaters sitting on tree branches, or flying off somewhere else to look for insects.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentaton)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Nani yina bobbidj, la ngabidbun wanjh ngarradjeng wanjh ngarradje ngayendedadjke ngayendedadjke kamankan." "Ma ma ma," bidbom wanjh yendedadjeng, yendedadjeng rowk 'wey bum' mankang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  You see that honey hive there, well I'll climb up and cut it, I'll cut all the branches off and it'll fall down. "Yeah OK, OK." He climbed up and cut all the branches off; 'thud', it fell down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Branch or tributary of a watercourse.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Synonyms[m]an-kaboh[m]ankabo.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Anyendewern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Lots of little tributaries or channels of a watercourse

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kind of sedge used for paint brushes which create the fine lines of hatching infill in painting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameCyperas javanicus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Kind of grass (possibly two different species).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific nameAlloteropsis semialata, Chrysopogon sp.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Anyokkorlomud ankung arribarungi arridjuhkeyi arringuni ngurrurdu arrikarlkidnguni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We used the an-yokkorlomud grass to soak up honey and to drink the gravy juice from cooked emus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Manyokkorlomud makka kundalk, kadjordmen kore manbehbeberrk. Kaluk birridalkmangi bu birribarungi mankung nawu dabborrabbolk, wanjh birridahkendongi kore bulbbe, yika kolod.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manyokkorlomud is a type of grass that grows in open forest country. Our ancestors use to gather it to wipe up honey, and put it into (tightly woven) dilly bags or the base of palm fronds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Kunj nawu kolobarr dja karndayh kabirridedjmadngun manbu kundalk manyokkorlomud.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Male and female antilopine kangaroos eat the roots of manyokkorlomud grass.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Island.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Kore manyunkurr, adjbud kayo.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    On the island, there is a beach.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Wildflower Band, ‘Galiwin’ku’)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Romantic partner, boyfriend/ girlfriend, secret lover.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Yiman ngad bininj, nungka wayarra mararradj kakarrme warridj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Just like people, wayarra spirits have boyfriends/girlfriends too.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  1Major regional ceremony associated with both duwa and yirridjdja moieties.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2Fine cross hatching designs relating to the Mardayin ceremony.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Warruwi/Goulburn Island.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Dja mak bu bininj kabirriwokngimen kondabeh kore Mardbalk wanjh dingki kabirrimlobme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        And if people phone Goulburn Island from here, people will come over in a dinghy [to pick them up].

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Small freshwater shrimp from the Arnhem Land plateau.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameMacrobrachium bullatum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Silver-leaved paperbark. Some Kuninjku speakers use this term as the kun-kurrng respect register term for paperbark. Some speakers say that this name is a generic term for all paperbarks which have removable useful bark.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Synonymsmankorrko

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scientific nameMelaleuca argentea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Manbu kundulk kadulkngeyyo mardderr ngalengman kadjordmen kore kukabohkabo, dja manbu kunmalaworr makka wanjh kamalaworrbume.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The silver-leaved paperbark grows by rivers, and the leaves give off a kind of haze (as oil evaporates from them in the sun).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Pandanus mats used by women as skirts. The word also commonly refers to flat pandanus mats made for sale in recent times as decorative art objects, often coloured with natural dyes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nawu marebu nakka nakimuk mat kabirrimarnbun. Daluhdaluk kabirrire kunngobarn kabirrimang dja kundulk manbu mandjarnngal kabirrikan kabirrikardmang manbu kunngobarn kahdjabdi manekke kabirrimang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A “marebu” is a big mat which people make. Women go and get pandanus, they take a forked stick along so they can hook the pandanus leaves with it [and pull them down], the straight leaves that stand upright.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scorpion.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Marla nakka nabang bu kanbaye dja kandong kunberd ngalengarre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Scorpions are dangerous if they bite you, they strike you with their tail.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Orphan child (vocative).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Birridoy rowk, wanjh birrikayhmeng, "Marladj", birrimarneyimeng, "Yimray ngundiwon". Yimarnek kamkuyinwam kondanj darnkih "Ya", birrimarneyimeng, wanjh nalkiduhdurndi djalwam wanjh doweng kunmarrwe.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          They pounded all the food, then they called him 'orphan boy' they said, "Come, they'll give you some." He came close up then "ya", they said to him [they tricked him and didn't give him the food] and so he went back crying and starving.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Very small tightly woven sacred dilly bag worn around the neck and containing cutting implements for ritual purposes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Bu mankole kabirriyamerren, bininj kabirribaye namekke marlakka ba kunyid kabenwon.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          During spear fights, men bite these sacred dilly bags (hanging around their neck) to give them fighting spirit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, Ngaldjordboh Story in ‘Kunwinjku Spirit’, Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Good, fine OK.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nawu nangomi yul nakka namarlang, nganweybom kunmulbbuy. Dja mak dakalhmeng ngadberre "Kolkkol karrimorndi kaluk milbabba ngurridokan bu ngurriwarnduyhme kore kumelworn".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Nawu nakudji bininj nakka namak, nganwong kunkanj. Dja mak yimeng ngadberre "Bolkkime karriyo kaluk malaywi ngurrire bu ngurridurndeng kore kured".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          That man is nice, he gave us some meat. He told us "Let's go to sleep now, and in the morning you can all go home".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • "Kakkak kamarlang karrokan kokok kukadjeh kabikurdudme marrkidjbu?"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "Kakkak, kamak kare kokok kukadjeh kabinan doctor?”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          “Kakkak, is it okay if older brother goes into town to see the doctor?”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Manakgu, Andrew, ‘Kunbalak : stories for Kunwinjku young people in Mother-in-law language, ordinary Kunwinjku and English’, Kunwinjku Language Centre, Gunbalanya, 1996, pp. 56-59)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Regular Bininj Kunwokmak

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1Malevolent spirit being, ghost.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2Name of a song set performed in Kuninjku and Kunbarlang languages. Also associated with song sets called mimih 'rock spirit' or yawkyawk 'young woman/mermaid'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            1Make, build, create.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Korroko dabborrabbolk birrimarnbuni mandjabu.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In the old days, people used to make fish traps.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Nungkah marnbom manekke Ubarr, nungkah marnbom Yirrbardbard.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              He created the Ubarr ceremony, Yirrbardbard created it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, ‘Kunwinjku Spirit’, Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            2 Do, complete a task or activity.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ngarrimarnbuni ngadberre lesson.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              We would do our lessons.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, ‘Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy’, PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            3Fix, heal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Muddikang ngarduk warreminj, ngakan kore mechanic kabirrimarnbun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              My car has broken down, I'll take it to the mechanic and they will fix it.
